original_text: And he measured the wall thereof, an hundred and forty and four cubits, according to the measure of a man, that is, of the angel.
korean_text: 그 성곽을 측량하매 백사십사 규빗이니 사람의 측량 곧 천사의 측량이라

sentences.original_text: And he measured the wall thereof
an hundred and forty and four cubits
according to the measure of a man
